name: MTLDynamicLibrary
desc: A dynamically linkable representation of compiled shader code for a specific Metal device object.

items.name: var device: MTLDevice
items.desc: The Metal device object that created the dynamic library.

items.name: var installName: String
items.desc: A file path for this dynamic library.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the library.

items.name: func serialize(to: URL)
items.desc: Writes the contents of the dynamic library to a file.
